Each pair of statistics corresponds to the number of ambulances between 1 and 12. For example,
the tuple at the 0th index corresponds to runs when the number of ambulances at each station is 
1, 1st index is 2 ambulances at each station, and so on. The first number in the tuple is the point estimate and
the second value is the half confidence interval.

Ex: (point estimate, half confidence interval)

totalWaitStats = [(430.4003859869565, 3.604749311911725), (232.02266183594043, 2.686144369490978), (121.44723107727482, 2.15838720094587), (58.56495941871784, 1.403114800925511), (26.966656806449244, 0.9682668442646576), (12.810393531187081, 0.6271203044073043), (6.071161293837985, 0.47917958743946903), (2.9386978615184494, 0.21761199425779076), (1.3861833961024386, 0.11027909518111616), (0.9295969889448337, 0.07433080145549274), (0.6800684397115405, 0.039556334980994985), (0.5928525881857905, 0.018096404269873356)]

severeWaitStats = [(430.4189798518475, 6.75677179696883), (229.25666347519285, 3.404915939267063), (120.3511222212467, 2.564130288774424), (57.71546448952471, 1.642066696160509), (25.790913336950492, 0.979812689400895), (11.955916251239756, 0.6301980237109421), (5.498322343751198, 0.5021048777868741), (2.353866681845349, 0.21421377084088297), (0.892337107742793, 0.1090660984376182), (0.4531183390114157, 0.07408429613570716), (0.22158273170907114, 0.031751614316691844), (0.14655567604589667, 0.012388173548088731)]

maxWaitStats = [(1169.6274509803923, 9.786638048313065), (867.8235294117648, 15.311498841722491), (659.8823529411765, 13.073528610695403), (471.7450980392157, 13.902490222874057), (309.62745098039215, 13.843264327379888), (194.3921568627451, 11.12763412008434), (117.15686274509804, 10.967227157782226), (67.74509803921569, 5.853610456456112), (43.13725490196079, 4.2031952012221705), (30.431372549019606, 2.433175045964847), (23.686274509803923, 2.164974102280392), (16.686274509803923, 1.774636920174589)]

maxSevereWaitStats = [(1114.137254901961, 13.680539355666136), (840.5098039215686, 16.496497072094176), (648.1960784313726, 13.701619396660734), (457.45098039215685, 14.310463369304774), (300.8627450980392, 13.913117589257926), (185.80392156862746, 11.148397480618081), (110.33333333333333, 10.98963215565477), (61.01960784313726, 5.843938634578674), (38.529411764705884, 3.8947718766586408), (25.313725490196077, 2.5689335651153304), (18.941176470588236, 2.3503457349640917), (11.03921568627451, 1.9198257053402124)]
